reviews.title: Flexible and Accommodating
reviews.text: I had a great time! I had just half a day and wanted a tour in the evening and I felt like this gave me all that I needed in just a few hours. My guide and chauffeur were very flexible when I changed my pick-up location twice and the team was very responsive on WhatsApp. They took  me away to see the fountains showing me the highlights and making sure I got to watch the story on the fountains and then took me to the very romantic downtown area which was full of life even in the evening. I was able to ask all my questions and was given a lot of flexibility when I needed to step aside and answer work questions. I highly recommend this tour!

reviews.title: Gorgeous at night with no stress!
reviews.text: Wonderful and easy way to see Lima at night. I was travel g solo before meeting a tour group and I booked this experience with the hope of getting a broad view of Lima at night and taking photos. Juan Carlos, our driver, navigated Lima‚Äôs busy traffic beautifully, and Carlos, my tour leader, made the evening memorable. He provided lots of historical context and he navigated me around the busy Water Park perfectly.  When we visited Historical Lima we stopped for. Pisco demonstration and tasting. Yum!  I am so glad I booked this tour!  Pro tip:  if you are in Lima on Sunday, book a tour for that day as traffic is more manageable.

reviews.title: Great experience.

reviews.title: Very cool Water Show
reviews.text: Our guide Carlos and our driver Juan were very good hosts, they even accommodated our request to visit Barranco since we knew the Historic Center.The tour was very pleasant and the Parque das √Åguas show was beautiful, and Carlos guided us through all the stages.I recommend!

reviews.title: Loved Seeing the City Lit Up!
reviews.text: It was wonderful to see Plaza de Armas & Plaza San Martin all lit up at night. They were places that I would not have explored solo in the evening, so it was wonderful to have a great guide like Enrique. He also took me to the amazing Magic Water Circuit and it was so efficient to be guided there because Enrique knew the area so well. It is a large park, and without guidance, I would probably have missed a lot of the fountains. I really enjoyed being with Enrique who shared his amazing knowledge about Lima. I highly recommend it!
